titles: The last work of a believer his passing prayer recommending his departing spirit to Christ to be received by Him / prepared for the funerals of Mary the widow first of Francis Charlton Esq. and after of Thomas Hanmer, Esq., and partly preached at St. Mary Magdalens Church in Milk-Street, London, and now, at the desire of her daughter, reprinted by Richard Baxter.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed by B. Griffin for B. Simmons,
notes: Reproduction of original in the British Library and Harvard University Library.
